answerText: H.D. [or Hilda Doolittle][10] This other imagist poet wrote about walking "down the garden paths" and seeing the title "Patterns" of one poem. She belonged to a family that also included the author of For the Union Dead.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 6 | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote the three books, "These Walls Do Not Fall," "Tribute to the Angels," and "The Flowering of the Rod," into a collection titled Trilogy. [10] Name this author who wrote, "Whirl up, seaÂ– Whirl your pointed pines," in one poem and published the collection Helen in Egypt.
